attributes.action: A general election must automatically be called after a prime minister resigns
attributes.additional_details: The current system means prime ministers can be elected without any say of the electorate, many recent examples show that unelected prime minsters just bring more chaos and don't last long at all
attributes.background: Pass legislation to make sure the resignation of a prime minister automatically triggers a General election

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
